sect2.title: Installation of Libassuan
sect2.para: Install Libassuan by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
./configure --prefix=/usr && make &&
makeinfo --html --no-split -o doc/assuan_nochunks.html doc/assuan.texi && makeinfo --plaintext -o doc/assuan.txt doc/assuan.texi

sect2.para: If you wish to build alternate formats of the documentation, you must have installed, then issue the following command:
To test the results, issue: make check.

screen.userinput:
make install &&
install -v -m755 -d /usr/share/doc/libassuan-&libassuan-version;/html && install -v -m644 README doc/assuan{_nochunks.html,.txt,.texi} \ /usr/share/doc/libassuan-&libassuan-version;
